0.name: Favonius Bladework: Dancing Radiance
0.old: Imitating an ancient knightly war-dance, Varka wields dual claymores to perform up to 5 consecutive strikes.
0.new: Manifest the true essence of Favonius Bladework with absolute power. Imitating an ancient knightly war-dance, Varka wields dual claymores to perform up to 5 consecutive strikes with enhanced damage.

1.name: Windbound Execution
1.old: Varka executes a powerful slash dealing Anemo DMG.
1.new: Varka executes a powerful slash dealing AoE Anemo DMG and switching to Sturm und Drang mode.

1.name: Shadowless Domain
1.old: Deals Electro DMG in a small area.
1.new: Deals AoE Electro DMG in a medium area and applies Ensnared status to enemies.
